name: ca.andreytitov.contextual-ao
description: This package includes a volume renderer with the Contextual Ambient Occlusion (CAO) algorithm that supports ambient occlusion with real-time clipping.

samples.description: Contains prefabs necessary for volume rendering with CAO.
Contains a sample VR scene which demonstrates interactive clipping of volumes with the CAO algorithm. Requires the XR Interaction Toolkit and OpenXR Plugin packages.
